long_description: The Gorillapod Micro 250 camera tripod is tiny but mighty. It supports point-and-shoot cameras up to 8.8 oz. and fits in virtually any pocket or camera case. Zinc alloy legs with rubber feet offer a stable base on a wide range of surfaces. Aluminum positioning ball provides up to 36deg of movement in any direction.
short_description: The Gorillapod Micro 250 camera tripod is tiny but mighty. It supports point-and-shoot cameras up to 8.8 oz. and fits in virtually any pocket or camera case.
